heading: Owner solicitation of tenant information
text:
Such owner shall request information relating to such tenant's
      separately metered energy use for the previous calendar year no earlier than January first and no later than January thirty-first
      of any year in which the owner is required to benchmark such building. The office of long-term planning and sustainability
      may require that such owner provide such tenant with a form designated by the office of long-term planning and sustainability
      to report such information.
